name: Jimmie Vaughan
description:
'''Jimmie Lawrence Vaughan Jr.''' (born March 20, 1951) is an American [[blues rock]] guitarist and singer based in [[Austin, Texas]]. He is the older brother of the [[Texas blues]] guitarist [[Stevie Ray Vaughan]]. He was a founding member of [[The Fabulous Thunderbirds]].

Several notable blues guitarists have had a significant influence on Vaughan's playing style, including the "Three Kings" ([[Albert King|Albert]], [[Freddie King|Freddie]], and [[B.B. King]]) and [[Johnny "Guitar" Watson]].
